secondaryPressed.$description: It is used only in design to visualize element state backgrounds

primaryDisabled.$description: It is used only in design to visualize element state backgrounds

primaryPressed.$description: It is used only in design to visualize element state backgrounds

maxImWideWidth.$description: The maximum width we allow "full-width" images to grow to when the screen size increases, for example in landscape and on iPad

maxHeroBannerWidth.$description: Constraints for all hero banner in Home Screen. (Not sure we need this one as it will adapt to screen sizes???

maxDealCardWidth.$description: Used in cards wrapping QR codes, added semantics namings and should tackle both Portrait (327pt max) and Landscape (500)

hSafeAreaInset.$description: iOS safeAreaInsets  / Android WindowInsetPadding. OBS Margin value 24pt transform into a "safe area inset" token, but beware this is not a safe area applied by device, is our margin transformed so that we can get reference values in Landscape, as Portrait device safe area are 0.

hBannerInset.$description: Use for banner components to set internal paddings. Replace Spatial System "Large" token to adapt to other devices
